name: Junkmon
effect: ＜Decoy ([Puppet] trait)＞ (When your opponent's effects would delete any of your other Digimon with the [Puppet] trait, by deleting this Digimon, 1 of those Digimon isn't deleted.)
inheritedEffect: ＜Barrier＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted in battle, by trashing your top security card, it isn't deleted.)

name: Shoemon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [Puppet] trait and 1 card with the [LIBERATOR] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck.
inheritedEffect: [Your Turn] All of your opponent's Security Digimon get -3000 DP.

name: PawnChessmon
effect: [On Play] By trashing 1 card with the [Puppet] trait in your hand, ＜Draw 2＞. (Draw 2 cards from your deck.)
inheritedEffect: ＜Reboot＞ (This Digimon also unsuspends in your opponent's unsuspend phase.)

name: PawnChessmon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[On Deletion] By trashing 1 card with the [Puppet] trait in your hand, ＜Draw 2＞. (Draw 2 cards from your deck.)

name: Doggymon
effect: [On Play] [On Deletion] Give 1 of your opponent's Digimon ＜Security A. -1＞ until the end of their turn. (This Digimon checks 1 fewer security card.)

name: Tobucatmon
effect: ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
inheritedEffect: ＜Barrier＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted in battle, by trashing your top security card, it isn't deleted.)

name: ShoeShoemon
effect:
[Security] You may play 1 card with the [LIBERATOR] trait and a play cost of 4 or less from your hand or trash without paying the cost.
＜Overclock ([Puppet] Trait)＞ (At the end of your turn, by deleting 1 of your Tokens or other [Puppet] trait Digimon, this Digimon may attack a player without suspending.)
inheritedEffect: [Your Turn] All of your opponent's Security Digimon get -3000 DP.

name: Pandamon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[On Deletion] You may play 1 level 3 Digimon card with the [Puppet] trait from your hand without paying the cost.

name: ExTyrannomon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.4 w/[Tyrannomon]/[Raremon] in name: Cost 3
＜Armor Purge＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, by trashing this Digimon's top stacked card, it isn't deleted.)
DigiXros-2: Lv.4 w/[Tyrannomon]/[Raremon] in name×Lv.4 w/[Puppet] trait
inheritedEffect: ＜Barrier＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted in battle, by trashing your top security card, it isn't deleted.)

name: Chaperomon
effect: [On Play] [When Digivolving] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn. If there are 3 or more Digimon, it further gets -3000 DP.
inheritedEffect: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon would leave the battle area other than by your effects, by deleting 1 of your Tokens or other [Puppet] trait Digimon, it doesn't leave.

name: Cendrillmon
effect:
＜Overclock ([Puppet] Trait)＞ (At the end of your turn, by deleting 1 of your Tokens or other [Puppet] trait Digimon, this Digimon may attack a player without suspending.)
＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[When Digivolving] You may play 2 [Familiar] Tokens. (Digimon/Yellow/3000 DP/"[On Deletion] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn.")

name: ShinMonzaemon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Monzaemon]/[Numemon] in name: Cost 3
＜Armor Purge＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, by trashing this Digimon's top stacked card, it isn't deleted.)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] By placing 1 level 5 or lower card with [Numemon] in its name or the [Puppet] trait from your trash as this Digimon's bottom digivolution card, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck as your top security card.)

name: Arisa Kinosaki
effect:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 or less memory, set it to 3.
[Your Turn] When effects play any of your Tokens or [Puppet] trait Digimon, by suspending this Tamer, 1 of those Digimon gains for the turn. (This Digimon can attack the turn it was played.)
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

name: Noble Family Arts
effect: [Main] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -6000 DP for the turn. If there are 3 or more Digimon, it further gets -6000 DP.

name: Yellow Memory Boost!
effect:
[Main] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 yellow Digimon card among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. Then, place this card in the battle area.
[Main] (By trashing this card after the placing turn, activate the effect.)
・Gain 2 memory.
securityEffect: [Security] Place this card in the battle area.

name: Offense Training
effect:

[Main] (By trashing this card after the placing turn, activate the effect.)
・1 of your Digimon may digivolve into a red Digimon card in the hand with the digivolution cost reduced by 2.
